parts.label: Verse 1
slides:
I love You, Lord
Oh, Your mercy never failed me
All my days, I've been held in Your hands

From the moment that I wake up
Until I lay my head
Oh, I will sing of the goodness of God

parts.label: Chorus 1
slides: And all my life You have been faithful
And all my life You have been so, so good
With every breath that I am able
Oh, I will sing of the goodness of God

parts.label: Verse 2
slides:
I love Your voice
You have led me through the fire
And in darkest night You are close like no other

I've known You as a Father
I've known You as a Friend
And I have lived in the goodness of God

parts.label: Bridge 1
slides: 'Cause Your goodness is running after, it's running after me
Your goodness is running after, it's running after me

With my life laid down, I'm surrendered now
I give You everything
'Cause Your goodness is running after, it's running after me

parts.label: Chorus 2
slides: And all my life You have been faithful
And all my life You have been so, so good
With every breath that I am able
Oh, I'm gonna sing of the goodness of God

parts.label: Tag 1
slides: Oh, I'm gonna sing of the goodness of God
